response.overview: In their past lives, Ivy and Daisy were both at the orphanage, waiting to be chosen by prospective parents. Daisy opted for a wealthy family, while Ivy joined a humble cleaner's household. Yet, Patrick Vance, the heir of the affluent family, was drawn to Ivy's independence. Consumed by jealousy, Daisy killed Ivy and then took her own life at their wedding. Reborn on the day of the selection, Daisy decides against the wealthy path, hoping to replicate Ivy's fate. However, she soon discovers that the cleaner's family is far from the paradise she imagined...
response.title: Ivy & Thorn: Ivy Never Fades
